column2:
"Ah, <%me>.
You came to see me again? That's very kind of you."
"I'm not very good at talking to other people... Whenever I try, I get too scared to speak..."
"Philia says I might be suffering from some kind of trauma, but I don't know what she means by that."
"But, for some reason, I'm OK with you. I can talk to you normally."
"I'm fine with just that much. Even if I can't remember anything, as long as I have someone I can talk to, I'll be happy."
